properties.text:
MUSE MUSIC GENERATOR (EXPERIMENTAL)

Report issues: github.com/Greg-Aster/ComfyUI_Muse

KNOWN LIMITATIONS:
- Lyrics influence style/melody, not exact words sung
- Instrumental mode may still have vocal-like sounds
- Quality varies by style and seed
- This is a 0.6B research model, not production quality

REQUIREMENTS:
- First run downloads ~10GB of models
- Requires 12-16GB VRAM

STYLE FORMAT (comma-separated tags):
- "Pop, Upbeat, Female Vocal, Synth, 120 BPM"
- "Rock, Ballad, Male Vocal, Electric Guitar, Drums"
- "Lo-fi, Hip Hop, Chill, Jazzy Piano, Vinyl Crackle"

LYRICS FORMAT:
[Verse]
Your verse lyrics here

[Chorus]
Your chorus lyrics here

widgets_values:
MUSE MUSIC GENERATOR (EXPERIMENTAL)

Report issues: github.com/Greg-Aster/ComfyUI_Muse

KNOWN LIMITATIONS:
- Lyrics influence style/melody, not exact words sung
- Instrumental mode may still have vocal-like sounds
- Quality varies by style and seed
- This is a 0.6B research model, not production quality

REQUIREMENTS:
- First run downloads ~10GB of models
- Requires 12-16GB VRAM

STYLE FORMAT (comma-separated tags):
- "Pop, Upbeat, Female Vocal, Synth, 120 BPM"
- "Rock, Ballad, Male Vocal, Electric Guitar, Drums"
- "Lo-fi, Hip Hop, Chill, Jazzy Piano, Vinyl Crackle"

LYRICS FORMAT:
[Verse]
Your verse lyrics here

[Chorus]
Your chorus lyrics here

[Verse]
Walking down the empty street
Memories beneath my feet
Every corner, every light
Reminds me of that night

[Chorus]
But I keep moving on
Even when the hope is gone
Through the darkness I will find
A new light to guide my mind
Pop, Upbeat, Female Vocal, Synth, Piano, Emotional, 110 BPM

groups.title: Muse Music Generator - Enter lyrics and style, then Queue Prompt
